Go to [Posit Cloud](https://posit.cloud),

![](fig/cloud_1.png)


If you already haven an account, click **Log In**. It will prompt you to log in either via email, or through other third party accounts like GitHub or Google Cloud. 

Once you've logged in, you should see a panel like below.

![](fig/cloud_2.png)
